response.original_title: THE WAY OF LIFE - RAISE A SUILEN Live 2022 "OVERKILL"
response.overview: The Blu-ray limited edition includes two separate live videos. The Disc1 includes patterns of the Yokohama performances that become the final of the RAISE A SUILEN ZEPP Tour 2021 "BE LIGHT" add-on performances. Disc2 has been released in June Live 2022 "OVERKILL" pattern as a single live in the Heidest Highland Conifer Forest, in June this year. The entire live has been recorded with 20 of the largest songs in band history. You won't miss out on this product that you can feel like RAS's "Life" to your heart's content.
response.title: THE WAY OF LIFE - RAISE A SUILEN Live 2022 "OVERKILL"
